jsocket.socket

Class StringSocketImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsocket.socket.SocketImpl
      • jsocket.socket.StringSocketImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Socket, StringSocket
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ObjectSocketImpl

    public class StringSocketImpl
extends SocketImpl
implements StringSocket
    Abstracts jsocket.socket.Socket implementations to handle strings instead of byte arrays It is suggested that implementation extend jsocket.socket.SocketImpl
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Will Czifro

      Sends a string, string will be converted to byte array then sent
      void setFilterFunction(FilterFunctionType type)
      A function can be used to process string before returning it in some cases, null characters are mixed in a string A filter function can be used to remove null characters
      void setFilterFunction(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> func)
      A function can be used to process string before returning it in some cases, null characters are mixed in a string A filter function can be used to remove null characters
